title: Ambush for Flamingoes
credit_line: Howard N. Eavenson Memorial Fund for the Howard N. Eavenson Americana Collection
provenance_text: George Catlin [1796-1872], United States of America. Leopold I [1790-1865], King of the Belgians, Belgium, 1859; Richard Smithhill, Rockbeare, Hampshire, England; H. Williams Gallery, New York, by 1907; Sir Edmund Osler [1845-1924], Toronto, by 1912; Royal Ontario Museum, Toronto, by 1912; Lee Pritzer, Canada, by 1953; Hirschl and Adler Galleries [1952-], New York, by 1953; M. Knoedler and Co. [1848-2011], New York, 1953 until February 1972; purchased by Museum, February 10, 1972.

creator.death_place: Jersey City (Hudson county, New Jersey, United States)
